title: Best Pad Thai
ingredients: ['225g broad rice noodles', '4 tablespoons tamarind paste', '75ml boiling water', '4 tablespoons ketchup', '2 limes, juiced', '3 tablespoons soy sauce', '1 tablespoon caster sugar', '1 tablespoon chilli paste (sambal oelek)', '4 tablespoons vegetable oil', '225g firm tofu, drained and cubed', '5 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '4 eggs, beaten', '200g bean sprouts', '75g ground peanuts, coarsely chopped', '5 spring onions, thinly sliced']
